metadata.dc:author: Romero Cárdenas, Angel
metadata.dc:description: Three-dimensional echocardiography (3D) has had a great development in the last few years. Its application has expanded to all groups of heart pathology, from congenital to degenerative. In a very short time it will become an important tool in the daily work of the cardiologist. 3D represents the noninvasive macroscopic pathology anatomy equivalent.
metadata.dc:title: Utilidad y limitaciones de la ecocardiografía tridimensional.
[Usefulness and limitations of three-dimensional echocardiography].
